entry.title: Who I am and what this project is about...
entry.summary: Hey Y'all my name is Daryl Barker and I am a current graduate student in library and information studies at UCLA. This project will explore how I go about developing concepts for, creating learning experiences in, and being in conversation with the academic library at…
entry.content: Hey Y'all my name is Daryl Barker and I am a current graduate student in library and information studies at UCLA. This project will explore how I go about developing concepts for, creating learning experiences in, and being in conversation with the academic library at UCLA. Ultimately, I am interested in engaging critical pedagogical techniques in my instruction and I think revealing the work that goes into putting these learning sessions together is a great place to start that engagement.Â
